import styles from './Footer.css'; import logo from '../images/linkedin_banner_image_1.png'; import { useContext } from 'react'; import { LanguageContext } from './LanguageContext'; const Footer = () => { const { switchLanguage } = useContext(LanguageContext); return (
{translations[language].company}
{translations[language].city}
{translations[language].employees}
{translations[language].founded}
CONTACT
StockW@gmail.com
123 Main St
Mon-Fri, 9am-5pm

); }; export default Footer;
